formalpara.title: Description
formalpara.para: A LENGTH ERROR in LiftFuncs[19] occurs with the following message.

listitem.screen: LiftFuncs[19] (1↑⍵)⍪⊃⍪/0 vis/z ⍝ Nodes just the same

formalpara.title: Analysis
formalpara.para: In the above code, 0 vis/z will always be a scalar, which means that we need to extract out the appropriate values from there before applying the catenation reduction. Adding a ⊃ fixes this problem.
